other_tests.findings: T score was 95, indicating clinically significant depression.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Improved to a score of 14 at discharge.
Score improved to 36 at discharge, then to 19 one week after starting methylphenidate.

other_tests.findings: Score was 36 upon second admission, indicating significant manic symptoms.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Improved to a score of 15 at discharge after treatment with lithium and haloperidol.
Decreased to 11 after treatment with carbamazepine.
